articles.content: Based on data compiled by Credible Operations, Inc., NMLS Number 1681276, current mortgage refinance rates have remained relatively unchanged since yesterday, with the exception of 15-year rates, whi… [+4561 chars]

articles.author: Ron Bousso
articles.title: France's Total quits top U.S. oil lobby in climate split - Reuters
articles.description: France's Total SE on Friday became the first major global energy company to quit the main U.S. oil and gas lobby due to disagreements over its climate policies and support for easing drilling regulations.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Frances Total SE on Friday became the first major global energy company to quit the main U.S. oil and gas lobby due to disagreements over its climate policies and support for easin… [+4603 chars]

articles.title: US Fed: CBDC a ‘very high priority’ to combat bad private sector money - Cointelegraph
